genres.name: Rock
genres.description: A genre characterized by strong rhythms, powerful vocals, and often electric instruments.

genres.name: Pop
genres.description: A genre known for catchy melodies, simple harmonies, and a focus on the singer's voice.

genres.name: Hip-Hop
genres.description: A genre that emphasizes rhythmic speech and lyrical flow, often accompanied by electronic beats.

genres.name: Electronic
genres.description: A genre that uses electronic musical instruments and digital audio workstations to produce sound.

genres.name: Country
genres.description: A genre originating from American folk music, typically featuring acoustic instruments and storytelling lyrics.
